title.romaji: Pi Zhe Lang Pi De Yang

description:
There exists a website where you just pay a few dollars and set a keyword, then you can easily enter the world of novels to personally run around and venture. After every time you enter, the experiences that occurred will automatically become parts of the novels. A new novelist, Lan Pi, saw such an introduction, mouse-clicked it, closed her eyes, and entered the VR world. The funny love between the gentle, black-hearted Sheep King and the funny, straightforward Wolf tomboy girl has just begun.

(Source: Kuaikan Manhua, translated)
